extendedInfo.description: Engage yourself with the new F1 Live experience. It is a complete application overhaul reflecting the spirit of F1 - its fast, its racy! We bring you an exclusive look and feel on the most exhilarating sport - be it the content, transition, animations, real time updates, commentary or news its all in a new package. You just can't stop looking at it. A quick description of what you can expect:STUNNING HOME PAGEGet a quick overview of status across completed, in-progress and yet to commence races. Race moments are reflected in real-time providing a quick insight into the top 3 driverpositions. Benefit from additional info covering tracks, weather etc without leaving this screen!DETAILED EVENT COVERAGEProviding a drilled down detail of what's happening in every lap, this screen sources informationacross all GP events - practice, qualifying or live race. Enjoy live commentary and real time lapchanges - get to know everything from whether the safety car is out to whose leading in which lap.RACY MENU NAVIGATIONA very racy look and feel when it comes to navigating across pages. Pinch it, swipe it to get quickaccess to any section across the app. A pit stop for every user to transition across pages.KNOW YOUR DRIVERS & TEAMSA detailed page with driver & team content for 2013. Get to know them all, their statistics and history.Every swipe and every transition reminds you of F1 and its style.STANDING PAGE & MORESee who's won and where they stand - whether its the team or driver. An array of interesting screens includingPodium finish, Swiping statistics, Real time blogger feeds, Overtaking animations and more will keep you glued to F1Live!!!DISCLAIMER:âThis App is unofficial and is not associated in any way with the Formula One group of companies.  F1, FORMULA ONE, FORMULA 1, FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP, GRAND PRIX, FORMULA ONE PADDOCK CLUB, PADDOCK CLUB and related marks are trade marks of Formula One Licensing B.V.â

reviews.title: It\'s good, but...
reviews.comment: It\'s a good app for F1 news, schedule, teams, and drivers, but the advertisements is on a timer and gets in the way while you read. Get rid of the advertisement or the timer.
reviews.author: will gladulich

reviews.title: get ur flags right, divum
reviews.comment: jokers u.. the app creator has listed the flag of north korea instead of south korea in the calendar!!!!!! hahahahahahahahahahaha
reviews.author: jaideep tondon

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Have been using this app for long time its getting better in each release...keep it up guys.
reviews.author: Saniel Kerketta

reviews.title: Needs a tablet version.
reviews.comment: This application has some good information on the F1 races and current standings but comes up a bit small on a tablet and just in portrait justification. It would be good to see a tablet version in landscape justification.
reviews.author: Martin Jennings

reviews.title: Ads are too often
reviews.comment: A good app but don\'t like seeing the ad page too often. I\'m deleting the app
reviews.author: Gavin Chan

reviews.title: Ads
reviews.comment: Ads ads ads...Uninstalled.  Better apps available
reviews.author: stephen wolohan

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: It is a game... See if you can finish reading a page before the advert pops up. Info is up to date. 1 star till you sort the pop up.
reviews.author: James Brown

reviews.title: Unverse update?
reviews.comment: Really loved the app before the latest update, now find very hard to use and look at results.
reviews.author: scott jucius

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Nice app for F1 ... Having all contents....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Very nice UI designed for F1 lovers!
reviews.author: ravi singh

reviews.title: its probably the best F1 app on the market
reviews.comment: its probably the best F1 app on the market, and trust me, ive looked for 2 years.  best part, its Made in India...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great F1app
reviews.comment: Gives you a better insight commentary then the official site.

reviews.title: Not working well
reviews.comment: Nice interface but It will only display race results and standings, it\'s not displaying any practice or qualification times or any other function. Too bad
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What the hell fix the problem
reviews.comment: Today being 29.4 the news section is still displaying news of baharain qualifying. Pls fix this problem
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect App! Must have!!
reviews.comment: Excellent app with easy UI, why pay \302\24320 for the other one which is a rip off, Top Notch!!!!!!!!

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Not a live software, false results, poor interface. Not so good advertice for divum software, I would say.  If you can\'t do it right, please don\'t do it at all - I think this is also true for free software.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not recommended
reviews.comment: Looks horrible and information is hard to access. Bad design makes text too small to read

reviews.comment: It\'s free and informative compared to expensive FIA app.
